game.name: Linker Hero
game.description:
It is time to be appeared in one of the best fighting games for boys available online for free. You will love recommending this brand new action-packed challenge to your friends and families if you have tried it once in your gaming device. It will be amazing to defeat Dracurious through the epic journey of Elucard in Linker Hero. Do not bother in case of being defeated by your rivals! You can play it as many times as you wish and become a full champion of action games.  
You will meet here with a brave hero who has missed out several links when he is on the mission of protecting his kingdom from all bad souls. This courageous soul has full faith on your intense fighting skill. Join this real battle challenge and get ready to guide him to create the needful connections in an assortment of magical orbs! Your enemies can vary from the angry rats to terrible druids. Give your helping hand to him and assist him to protect his kingdom in this action-packed puzzle!
Be prepared to play the role of a true warrior and keep fighting against a horde of dangerous creatures who look forward to invade his kingdom! Do not forget to unite all the pieces of the same color you see on the board to get your character ready to bear the attacks from his enemy! You will obtain an additional power after accumulating many of the pieces of same color. The awesome retro graphics and seamless gameplay can keep you busy for long hours. Play multiplayer action games online to become a victorious!
